sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for February 8 - 9

day: Intersection Closure Scheduled for Cooper Dr at University Dr:
event: Friday 2/7 at 9 a.m. thru Monday 2/10 at 6 a.m. for major utility work.  Times are approximate.

day: Intersection Closure Scheduled for Cooper Dr at University Dr:
event: Traffic on University Dr may go straight through the intersection or turn right onto Cooper Dr, but may not turn left onto Cooper Dr.

day: Intersection Closure Scheduled for Cooper Dr at University Dr:
event: Traffic on Cooper Dr approaching University Dr from either direction MUST turn right onto University Dr.

day: Intersection Closure Scheduled for Cooper Dr at University Dr:
